publicationStmt.publisher: Department of English, University of New Mexico

head.title: Blake/An Illustrated Quarterly Index to Volume 16

div1.p: The first number in the reference is the whole number of the issue (nos. 61-64); the second is the page reference within the issue. Thus, 62:82 signifies whole number 62, page 82.
